page.title: 09HEALTH Essex/Cambs Border
page.content: A member of most households has consulted a doctor during the year - mainly a General Practitioner from neighbouring villages - Sawston, Newport, Barley, Gt. Chesterford. The majority of patients travel to surger- ies although there were a few home visits. The nearest hospital is Addenbrookes, Cambridge - 15 miles away and Saffron Walden. People travel to dentists, opticians and chiropod- ists in a variety of directions - Saffron Walden, Shelford, Cambridge, Royston. A General Practitioner visits Chrishall village twice weekly for open-surgeries. There are also visits by a District Nurse and Health Visitors.
